mapper.select: SELECT GRP_NO as id, GRP_NM as text, PAR_GRP_NO as parentId FROM usergroup

select m.grp_no, m.mem_no as id, m.mem_nm as memberName, m.phone_no as phoneNo , m.email, tech_cd.cd_dtl_nm as tech, pos_cd.cd_dtl_nm as position, g.grp_nm as groupName from member m, codedetail tech_cd, codedetail pos_cd, usergroup g where m.tech_grd_cd = tech_cd.cd_dtl_no and m.pos_nm = pos_cd.cd_dtl_no and m.grp_no = g.grp_no and m.grp_no = #{groupNo} order by pos_cd.order_no, tech_cd.order_no

SELECT m.mem_no, m.mem_nm, auth.cd_dtl_nm AS AUTH, g.grp_nm, pos.cd_dtl_nm AS POSITION, pm.pre_start_dt, pm.pre_end_dt, pm.start_dt, pm.end_dt, m.email, m.phone_no, tech.cd_dtl_nm AS TECH, t.tm_nm, t.tm_no, t.order_no, t.par_tm_no FROM projectmember pm, member m, usergroup g, codedetail tech, codedetail pos, codedetail auth, team t WHERE pm.mem_no = m.mem_no AND m.grp_no = g.grp_no AND m.tech_grd_cd = tech.cd_dtl_no AND m.pos_nm = pos.cd_dtl_no AND pm.prj_auth_cd = auth.cd_dtl_no AND pm.tm_no = t.tm_no AND pm.tm_no IN ( SELECT t2.tm_no FROM team t2 WHERE t2.prj_no = #{projectNo} ) ORDER BY t.tm_no

SELECT m.mem_no, m.mem_nm, auth.cd_dtl_nm AS AUTH, g.grp_nm, pos.cd_dtl_nm AS POSITION, pm.pre_start_dt, pm.pre_end_dt, pm.start_dt, pm.end_dt, m.email, m.phone_no, tech.cd_dtl_nm AS TECH, t.tm_no, t.tm_nm, t.order_no FROM projectmember pm, member m, usergroup g, codedetail tech, codedetail pos, codedetail auth, team t WHERE pm.mem_no = m.mem_no AND m.grp_no = g.grp_no AND m.tech_grd_cd = tech.cd_dtl_no AND m.pos_nm = pos.cd_dtl_no AND pm.prj_auth_cd = auth.cd_dtl_no AND pm.tm_no = t.tm_no AND m.mem_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT m.mem_no, m.mem_nm, auth.cd_dtl_nm as AUTH, gr.grp_nm, pos.cd_dtl_nm as POSITION, pm.pre_start_dt, pm.pre_end_dt, pm.start_dt, pm.end_dt, tech.cd_dtl_nm as TECH, m.email, m.phone_no, pmt.tm_no, pmt.tm_nm, pmt.order_no FROM projectmember pm, member m, usergroup gr, codedetail auth, codedetail pos, codedetail tech, (SELECT t.tm_no, t.tm_nm, pm.mem_no, t.order_no FROM team t, projectmember pm WHERE t.tm_no = pm.tm_no AND t.par_tm_no IS NOT NULL ) pmt WHERE pm.prj_auth_cd = auth.cd_dtl_no AND m.tech_grd_cd = tech.cd_dtl_no AND m.pos_nm = pos.cd_dtl_no AND pm.mem_no = m.mem_no AND m.grp_no = gr.grp_no AND pm.mem_no = pmt.mem_no AND pm.tm_no = #{teamNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE projectmember SET tm_no = #{teamNo} WHERE mem_no = #{memberNo} and tm_no = #{beforeTeamNo}
